mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_comment_id as feedCommentId , a.comment , b.user_id as writerUserId , IF(b.nick_name IS NULL, b.uid, b.nick_name) , b.pic as writerPic FROM feed_comment a INNER JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY feed_comment_id desc LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
